articles.title: As Ukraine loses troops, how long can it keep up the fight? - Times of India
articles.description: Europe News: ZHYTOMYR: As soon as they had finished burying a veteran colonel killed by Russian shelling, the cemetery workers readied the next hole.
articles.content: Biden has reunited the West. Can he reunite America?Biden just put Nato, Europe and the whole Western alliance together to help Ukraine against Putin's assault. But with every mass shooting, racist e… [+106 chars]

articles.author: Alan Friedman
articles.title: Big vote on Tuesday in Europe could determine the future of the Lightning port on iPhone - PhoneArena
articles.description: By next week, when voting ends on June 7th in Europe, we should know whether Apple will need to replace the Lightning port with USB-C in Europe at least.

articles.title: Fuel pump prices in Singapore reach new high, breach S$4 mark for the first time | Malay Mail - Malay Mail
